title: Testimonial Page
description: This challenge is to practice more advanced HTML and CSS skills. The challenge is to create a simple testimonial page that challenges you to use grid, media queries, icons,...

userStories.content: Create a reviewer page that matches the given design.
Use HTML to create basic structure.
Add heading, body text, checklists according to the design.
Add 2 testimonial cards according to the design.
Use CSS to style the card.
The page should be responsive on different screen sizes.
